author: Special Correspondent
text:
A newspaper report has claimed that the alleged member of the Islamic State, Siddhartha Dhar, a Londoner who goes by the name Abu Ramaysah, is a Bengali.

Siddharth is believed to be the new Jihadi John in the new IS propaganda video released on Sunday. It shows a masked man ordering the execution of five “British spies.”

His mother Sabita Dhar spoke to Ananda Bazar Patrika ’s London correspondent. She said the family was in “a state of shock.” His sister Kanika told the media in London that while she was unsure if the man in the video was Siddharth, the voice resembled his.
title: IS militant may be a Bengali
